Text: iko e-le̩ Jihofa ko̩la lʼalu Aizaya o̩ma Emo̩z, kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ mʼe̩gbanukpo le̩ tu bʼago-we̩ te̩, kʼe̩ la mʼe̩da gwo̩ bʼe̩re̩-we̩ te̩. Oñ i fʼabe̩le̩ che, i tʼago ofo kpai e̩re̩ ofo alule̩.
Taki Jihofa kakini, Alu kʼadu-mi Aizaya-i tʼale ago ofo kpai e̩re̩ ofo o̩do̩ me̩ta kʼi chʼujiwe kpai e̩wñ awuwu ugbo o̩la Iiipti kpai o̩la Itiopia le̩,
abe̩le̩ oñ onu Asiria akʼame̩namu Ijipti alo, manyʼabo Itiopia ku ma ne bʼane̩-ma te̩, tʼimo̩to̩, tʼogijo, ago ofo kpai e̩re̩ ofo, ofe-ma la ate̩ ofo, ki mud anyo̩ ñw abo Ijipti.
E̩do̩-ma la ada kpu, ibe-ma la adajugu nyʼomune̩, noji Itiopia ku ma kibeno le̩, kpʼe-Ijipti ki chʼalifia-ma.
Tak abo ku ma dodo ane̩ o̩lʼomi-i aka o̩jo̩ le̩ kakini, Go, abu kʼukibeno-wa de̩ owñ chʼugbo kʼa ra nyi ku ma te̩ko wa, ku ma gba wa bʼo̩wo̩ onu Asiria te̩! Ab awa ale kʼa amufu tane̩?
